projects.title: Partyer
projects.tagline: Find parties and events near you!
projects.description: An Android App for 'finding' events you want to attend. Created in free time to focus on learning more about how to architect an Android app and include Dagger 2.

projects.title: All Calendars
projects.tagline: You should just do it the expected way.
projects.description: Android app focused on diving down into all the different ways you can use a calendar with your app.

projects.title: Sam I Am Recipes
projects.tagline: Want to try something new in the kitchen? Explore here!
projects.description: Class project turned personal project. Uses Angular 1 and Bootstrap for the frontend. Gets data from the RecipePuppyAPI using a simple server using http.

projects.title: Edgerh Name Converter
projects.tagline: A fun converter to help make names modern and fantastic.
projects.description: Personal project created by a friend and myself. Uses Bootstrap and Angular 1. Worked on logic for string replacement and implemented features such as the pronouncer.

projects.title: Crazy Cat Lady Tower Defense Game
projects.tagline: Don't let that nasty Slime Warlock get your cats!
projects.description: Class team project. Used Unity to create a tower defense game. Worked on game logic for attacks as well as game art for two of the characters.

projects.title: ButtonGrid Game
projects.tagline: Push some buttons and feel frustration with this simple game
projects.description: Personal project using Bootstrap for layout. Really simple web game that just uses JavaScript for all logic.

projects.title: SneakSpeak
projects.tagline: Helping users with their fly kicks since 2017
projects.description: Hackathon project for BrickHacks 2017 and won the SNAP award. Worked on app layout, design of logo, and a bit of the frontend to edit the UI.

projects.title: Mea Ola Creatures
projects.tagline: A virtual pet to live in your browser!
projects.description: Hackathon project for BrickHacks 2015 and won Best Game. Worked with Unity to create an arena for the creatures to interact in.

projects.title: Audition Aid
projects.tagline: Find the perfect musical theater audition piece
projects.description: Hackathon project from WiCHacks 2015 and won Best Microsoft Hack. Worked on integrating Spotify Web Players into search results using Python.
